title: [娱乐]Custom EnderChest —— VIP式的末影箱,自定义末影箱格数[1.8]
author: Smali
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 07:24 编辑 




Permissions
默认情况玩家将无法打开末影箱！
CustomEnderChest.level.0 - For 9 slots(1 raw) EnderChest sizeCustomEnderChest.level.1 - For 18 slots(2 raw's) EnderChest sizeCustomEnderChest.level.2 - For 27 slots(3 raw's) EnderChest sizeCustomEnderChest.level.3 - For 36 slots(4 raw's) EnderChest sizeCustomEnderChest.level.4 - For 45 slots(5 raw's) EnderChest sizeCustomEnderChest.level.5 - For 54 slots(6 raw's) EnderChest sizeCustomEnderChest.commands - 能够打开某个玩家的箱子，命令： /customec openCustomEnderChest.admin - 管理权限

指令：
/customec or /customec help - 帮助
/customec open - 打开末影箱
/customec open <name> - 打开某个玩家的末影箱
/customec delete <name> -删除某个玩家的末影箱
/customec reload - 配置重读

下载地址
CustomEnderChest-v1.0.jar
